definitions.text: a person who takes a position in the political center
lessen the intensity of; temper; hold in restraint; hold or keep within limits

examples: He moderated his tone when the students burst out in tears

definitions.text: make less strong or intense; soften
examples: The author finally tamed some of his potentially offensive statements

definitions.text: being within reasonable or average limits; not excessive or extreme
examples: the X-ray showed moderate enlargement of the heart
temperate in his response to criticism

definitions.text: marked by avoidance of extravagance or extremes
